entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
